original_title: Woman raped and murdered in Mihintale, suspect arrested
original_body_lines: A woman was raped and killed in a house at Doramadalawa in Mihintale yesterday, police said.

Investigations have revealed that the deceased was staying at home with her mother and while the mother had gone to work in a nearby house, a person residing in a nearby village had come to the house, had raped and killed the woman.
The deceased was identified as a 51-year-old resident of the Doramadalawa area.
The 47-year-old suspect has been arrested and the Mihintale police are conducting further investigations.
